title: init​
content: This item only works when running on the client. Client This item only works when running on the server. Server </> transcrypt.init( Folder: Folder -- The folder where you want the remote events to be stored ) → () To initialize transcrypt

title: Fire​
content: This item only works when running on the client. Client This item only works when running on the server. Server </> connection:Fire( Name: string,-- Name of the Plug ...: any-- The parameters you want to pass ) → () Fire an event to either the client or the server, if on the client then this sends to the server, if your on server then to client.

title: FireAClient​
content: This item only works when running on the server. Server </> connection:FireAClient( Player: Player ,-- The player you want to send an event to Name: string,-- the name of the plug ...: any-- The parameters you want to pass ) → () Fire an event to the client

title: Plug​
content: This item only works when running on the client. Client This item only works when running on the server. Server </> connection:Plug( Name: string,-- the name of the plug Callback: function-- callback function for when the plug is called ) → () Create a plug, this is where you add events
